In front of the station building is a roundabout with traffic lights, providing easy access to the other side of the road for pedestrians.

Sandıklı consists of the twisting alleys of the older uphill part of the town, and the adjacent newer part along the wide avenue leading to the highway skirting the town to west, with the not-so-big central square inbetween these two parts. Walking from highway to the square takes about 20–25 minutes.
